name: World Horizons
goal: World Horizons is an inter-denominational Christian charity working in partnership with the global church. Our short and long term teams work mainly with young people, in areas including training, cross-cultural exchange, sustainable development and business initiatives, to see individual lives and communities transformed.
interests: Culture, Culture and media, Education and training, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Sport, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Passive following of
EU and the global development framework after 2015
Religious Freedom
